title: 1912 D. W. Griffith The Female Of The Species

sources.title: 1912 D. W. Griffith The Female Of The Species
sources.description: Four survivors from an abandoned mining town, a married couple, the wife's sister, and a younger woman, are making a desperate trip to safety across the desert. The wife suspects the younger woman of having an affair with her husband, and soon afterwards the husband dies suddenly. The three women must then continue their journey amidst the growing tensions caused by the wife's desire for revenge. Cast Charles West ... The Miner  Claire McDowell ... The Miner's Wife  Mary Pickford ... The Miner's Wife's Sister  Dorothy Bernard ... The Other Woman  Directed by D. W. Griffith Cinematography by Billy Bitzer Details Country USA Release Date: April 15, 1912 Filming Locations: Cudderbackville, New York, USA Production Co: Biograph Company
